MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Barrhead and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:13am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:17am on the 22nd of January 2021.
